short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates the molarmass of a molecule

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension calculates the molarmass of a molecule.
The extension allows you to click the result to copy it to the clipboard.

Made by a GameTech'er at Friis.
You can thank me later:)
